EmailTemplate.description: Glad to have you on board
EmailTemplate.name: Email to be sent to Closed Won clients
EmailTemplate.subject: Glad to have you on board
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to Intuit QuickBooks!
Glad to have you on board!
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}, Thank you for subscribing to QuickBooks; details of your subscription are:
Email ID Company ID(s) Company name
{!Opportunity.Primary_Contact_Email__c} {!Opportunity.Company_ID__c} {!Opportunity.Account}
If you ever get stuck with QuickBooks anytime during your subscription, feel free to reach us. We're here to help.
Here are a bunch of ways for you to get in touch with us
QuickBooks support Visit now
Call us 1800 102 5599*
Live community Ask a question
Webinars Register now
We hope you would find QuickBooks helpful in running your business. Have an awesome day! {!User.Name} Quickbooks Consultant {!User.Email} {!User.MobilePhone}
*Mon to Sat 9:30 am - 6:00 pm Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement. Â© Intuit India Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
